document.full_text: levi leipheimer slipped ahead in the final yards to claim the mountainous seventh stage of the tour of california on saturday, while radioshack teammate chris horner finished second just behind and solidified his pending overall race title.
document.title: leipheimer wins 7th stage of tour of california
lines_and_colors: levi leipheimer slipped ahead in the final yards to claim the mountainous seventh stage of the tour of california on saturday, while radioshack teammate chris horner finished second just behind and solidified his pending overall race title.
